'''Masa''' is an open-world [[NPC]] located in {{Location|"Collective of Plenty"}}. It is [[Xoctli]]'s [[Saurian]] companion.

==Dialogue==
===Dialogue Set #1===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Masa:''' (You're not sure why, but this Tatankasaurus seems a little lost...)
{{Dialogue End}}

===Dialogue Set #2===
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Talk to Masa while [[indwelling]] a Saurian)
:'''Masa:''' Xoctli used to rely on me in the old days. But now, I'm not even needed when it comes time to plow the fields or transport food...
:'''Masa:''' What's the meaning of life for a saurian who doesn't even work?
:'''Masa:''' Is the only thing left for me... to keep Xoctli's daughter, [[Cuaxilo]], company while she watches the luchador matches?
{{Dialogue End}}
